fields.label: Preloader
fields.name: preloader
fields.instructions: The Preloader will be displayed before the page loads. This is useful if your site has pages with a lot of content.

fields.label: Cookie Notice
fields.name: cookie_notice
fields.instructions: Cookie Notice allows you to inform users that your site uses cookies and helps you comply with the EU GDPR cookie law and CCPA regulations. The use of this functionality, such as all descriptions contained therein, is at your own risk.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: cookie_description
sub_fields.default_value: We use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience, personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. Read about how we use cookies and how you can control them by clicking Cookie Settings. You consent to our cookies if you continue to use this website.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: essential_description
sub_fields.default_value: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: analytics_description
sub_fields.default_value: We use analytics cookies to help us measure how users interact with website content, which helps us customize our websites and application for you in order to enhance your experience.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: performance_description
sub_fields.default_value: These cookies are used to enhance the performance and functionality of our websites but are non-essential to their use. For example it stores your preferred language or the region that you are in.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: marketing_description
sub_fields.default_value: These cookies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you and your interests. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

fields.label: reCAPTCHA
fields.name: recaptcha
fields.instructions: Protect your forms with this facility, to avoid spam or messages triggered by other computers or robots. The idea is that the answer to captcha tests is an impossible solution for a computer, thus allowing only human beings to have access to certain contents or to send information.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Very first thing you need to do is register your website on Google reCAPTCHA V3. See the documentation.

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: single_page
fields.instructions: Adjust the Hero Section Layout. What is set here will be applied to Pages and Posts.

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: blog_layout
fields.instructions: Adjust the Blog Layout. What is set here will be applied to the grid blocks of the pages: Blog Posts, Taxonomy and Search Results.

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: single_post
fields.instructions: Here you can configure the Single Post Pages.

fields.label: Share Links
fields.name: single_post_share_links
fields.instructions: Here you can add sharing links. Use {link} to add the link to the current post and {title} for the post title.

fields.label: Post Slug
fields.name: single_portfolio_post_slug
fields.instructions: Text displayed in the url: e.g. https://your-domain.com/POST-SLUG/your-portfolio-page

fields.label: Category Slug
fields.name: single_portfolio_category_slug
fields.instructions: Text displayed in the url: e.g. https://your-domain.com/CATEGORY-SLUG/your-category-page

fields.label: Custom ID
fields.name: custom_custom_id
fields.instructions:
Assigning an ID to this section, you can use it to create an anchor link.
Read more.

fields.label: Enable on Pages
fields.name: enable_custom_on_pages
fields.instructions: Please enable this section to appear on all pages.

fields.label: Enable on Posts
fields.name: enable_custom_on_posts
fields.instructions: Please enable this section to appear on all post pages.

fields.label: Custom Class
fields.name: custom_custom_class
fields.instructions: Enter a Class if you want to create Custom CSS.

fields.label: Enable Divider
fields.name: custom_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Enable on Front Page
fields.name: enable_custom_on_front_page
fields.instructions: Enable so that this section appears only on the front page.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: custom_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: custom_background_color
fields.instructions: That color will be applied to this section.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: custom_container
fields.instructions: Choose the width of the Container in this section.

fields.label: Vertical Spacing
fields.name: custom_vertical_spacing
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of this section in the Desktop Version. (Screens larger than 768px).

fields.label: Vertical Spacing < 768px
fields.name: custom_vertical_spacing_responsive
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of this section in the Mobile Version. (Screens smaller than 768px).

fields.label: Heading Style
fields.name: custom_heading_style
fields.instructions: Choose the style of the Title for this section.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: custom_description
fields.instructions: Create a description that will be positioned below the Title.

fields.label: Content
fields.name: custom
fields.instructions: Here you can create anything. Even use shortcodes from plugins, such as forms and galleries. On the pages you can choose individually to show this content or not.
